context: Does the wired controller can connet to PC through USB directly? or I need other tool support ?
response: This controller is PC and USB ready. It'll connect to any PC in a snap; no drivers or peripheral cables needed! The controller is a bit pricey, but very much worth it.

context: Could someone suggest a good guitar to use this with? Something cheap yet not horrible and sold on Amazon? Thanks!

context: Do I have to have Steam to play this game?

context: can this hook up to ps3? ps4? i have a monitor with headphone jack, that works?
response: If you only have one input, you will need to use a Y connector. If you have one for speaker and one for mic you will be able to plug it in without an issue. It uses the 3.5mm ends.

context: Can I use this on PS4
response: The Tango headset model is compatible out-of-the-box for surround-sound game audio on the PS4 console. Chat compatibility will require a PS4 Chat Cable or PS4 Talkback Cable (sold separately) connected from the headset to the bottom of the PS4 controller.

context: What is the difference between the Standard and Survival Edition?
response: Survival edition not only comes with not only the game, but extras like an art book and comic.

context: In terms of the story line, will everything still make sense if I haven't played Persona 1, 2, or 3?
response: Each game in the persona series starts anew with their own independent story, so just like with final fantasy no persona game so far has been a sequel to any in terms of story. Just a little spoiler warning in terms of story P1-P3 have pretty dark stories, P4 is golden for a reason.

context: Can this be used to connect a PS2 controller to a PC?
response: Yes. That's the main thing I do with this adapter. Just be sure to press the analog button on the controller for it to work properly. Also, the controller may not work by default in newer games due to the way they are programmed. Using a program called x360ce can allow it to work in those games as well.

context: is it about the clone wars pleace answere
response: Unfortunately, no. Although it could have been, LucasArts chose not to do any Clone Wars campaigns in this game. Pity. The Clone Wars had a lot more variety of ships and troops to choose from, and who wouldn't want to take Torrents against droid fighters? Not to mention seeing how a Banking Clan frigate stacks up against a Venator!

context: I have a PS4 and looking for games for my 5 year old son. Would he be able to play this if not do you suggestions?
response: I feel that it would be a good game for kids.  It doesn't have any blood or gore.  It's more along the lines of the old fashioned type video games.
